Package ohos.sysappcomponents.calendar.entity

Class Reminders

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sysappcomponents.calendar.entity.CalendarEntity
      • ohos.sysappcomponents.calendar.entity.Reminders
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseColumns, EventsColumns, RemindersColumns

    public class Reminders
extends CalendarEntity
implements BaseColumns, RemindersColumns, EventsColumns
    Describes a calendar reminder entity, including the column name of the database table.

    3
